extends java.lang.Object
implements Screen, FontMetricsHandler

      Handle the mouse event on the dialog screen
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      id - The id of the mouse event
      x - The x coordinate of the mouse event
      y - The y coordinate of the mouse event
      clickCount - The click count on the mouse event
      button - The button pressed on the mouse
      modifiersEx - The modifier active on the mouse event
